title.en: Hydrogen Based Green Energy Carriers - Technology and Economy

description.en: The course provides an overview of the main possibilities of hydrogen energy as a sustainable solution for green energy storage. The course explains the advantages and the main bottlenecks of hydrogen energy. The course provides an overview of the main possibilities of hydrogen production, storage and use on a technical level, but also introduces the socio-economic aspects of hydrogen deployment, and explores future scenarios and predictions.
description.et: Kursus annab ülevaate põhilistest vesinikenergeetika võimalustest jätkusuutliku lahendusena roheenergia salvestamisel. Kursuse raames selgitatakse millised on vesinikenergeetika eelised ja põhilised kitsaskohad. Kursus annab ülevaate põhilistest vesiniku tootmise, salvestamise ja kasutamise võimalustest tehnilisel tasemel kuid avab ka vesiniku kasutuselevõtu sotsiaalmajanduslikke aspekte, vaatleb tulevikustsenaariume ja prognoose.

objectives.en: The purpose of the course is to provide an overview of the fundamentals of hydrogen energy at both a technical and socioeconomic level. The course introduces the key technologies for hydrogen production and storage as well as the most important applications of hydrogen in both the transport and industrial sectors. In addition to the researchers of the University of Tartu, the course is conducted by the top specialists from Estonian companies dealing with hydrogen energy.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on anda ülevaade vesinikenergeetika põhialustest nii tehnilisel kui ka sotsiaalmajanduslikul tasemel. Tutvutakse vesiniku tootmise ja salvestamise võtmetehnoloogiatega ning vesiniku kõige olulisemate rakendustega nii transpordi- kui tööstussektoris. Kursust viivad lisaks Tartu Ülikooli õppejõududele läbi tippspetsialistid vesinikenergeetikaga tegelevatest Eesti ettevõtetest.

learning_outcomes.en: A student who completed the course:
1. Knows why the transition to sustainable energy solutions is necessary and is acquainted with the opportunities of the application of hydrogen energetics.
learning_outcomes.et: 1. Teab miks on vajalik üleminek jätkusuutlikele energialahendustele ja milliseid võimalusi pakub selles valdkonnas vesinikenergeetika rakendamine.

learning_outcomes.en: 2. Knows the main hydrogen production technologies, is aware of the basic materials used in these technologies, and knows the factors that affect the efficiency and performance of these systems.
learning_outcomes.et: 2. Tunneb põhilisi vesiniku tootmise tehnoloogiaid, teab nendes kasutatavaid põhilisi materjale, teab nende süsteemide efektiivsust ja jõudlust defineerivaid asjaolusid.

learning_outcomes.en: 3. Knows the main hydrogen storage options and the advantages as well as disadvantages of different storage methods.
learning_outcomes.et: 3. Tunneb põhilisi vesiniku salvestamise võimalusi ja erinevate salvestusviiside eeliseid ja puudusi.

learning_outcomes.en: 4. Knows the basic direct and indirect application possibilities of hydrogen both in transport and industrial sectors (synthesis gas, ammonia, etc.). Knows both the advantages and weaknesses of these applications.
learning_outcomes.et: 4. Teab põhilisi vesiniku rakendusi nii transpordi- kui tööstussektoris (sünteesgaas, ammoniaak jne.). Teab nende rakenduste eeliseid ja ka nõrkusi.

learning_outcomes.en: 5. Is familiar with various hydrogen energy development projections and scenarios.
learning_outcomes.et: 5. On kursis erinevatest vesinikenergeetika arenguprognoosidega ning arengustsenaariumitega.

learning_outcomes.en: 6. Is familiar with the considerations of a large energy company when implementing hydrogen energy.
learning_outcomes.et: 6. On kursis suure energiaettevõtte kaalutlustega vesinikenergeetika rakendamisel.
